reviewText: These are the half hour shows minus the commercials.  So we exercise avout twenty minutes. That's not much but it's twenty minutes longer than I was doing and I am looking forward to where I can do two a day.  Sorry the Glamour  thingy isn't being made any longer.
These are wonderful!  I got the set for my Mom who is 90. I remember her working out with Jack LaLanne when I was a kid, and she is really enjoying working out with him again!  Perfect!!

Thank goodness I could still get these vintage Jack Lalanne tapes...I am almost 70 years old and I can keep up with these exercises. His routines make it very easy to get into shape without hurting yourself. I like his positive attitude too!
